articles.author: Kenya Hunter
articles.title: Spring allergies are back. Here’s how to check pollen levels and keep from sneezing - AP News
articles.description: Allergy season can be miserable for tens of millions of Americans each year. Allergies are caused by trees, grass, and other pollens and symptoms include a runny nose, itchy eyes, coughing and sneezing. The severity of your allergies can depend on where you l…
articles.content:
ATLANTA (AP) Allergy season can be miserable for tens of millions of Americans when trees, grass, and other pollens cause runny noses, itchy eyes, coughing and sneezing.
